author: craigmcc
msg: Add a small test suite, in the form of a new web application named
"struts-test", that can be used to quickly validate the behavior of the
tags.  The initial tests cover only the beans in the new "struts-bean" tag

author: craigmcc
msg: Check in some corrections to the new "struts-bean" custom tags that were
uncovered by a small test suite that will be checked in next.  These tags
As described in the TODO document, the existing Struts tags are getting
separated into smaller libraries that have functional coherence.  You will
be able to use them together with no problems -- however, the individual
libraries will often be useful on their own as well.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add releaseCustomAttributes() method -- for JSP 1.2 compatility -- to

author: craigmcc
msg: Add the initial version of the "include" tag.
